bibl.title: Ben cao gang mu dictionary Vol1

sense.def: Pathological Condition identical with feng kuang 風狂 , wind madness. Nan jing 難經 59: 狂疾之始發，少 臥而不飢，自高賢也，自辨智也，自倨貴也，妄笑好歌樂，妄行不休是 也 , “When the ailment of madness breaks out for the first time, [patients] do not lie down much and they have no appetite. They think of themselves as the greatest, wisest, and worthiest. They laugh without meaning, and they love to sing and be joyful. Their endless movements make no sense”.
